title: The Child and the saw
creator_credit: IKON (GB), Richard Heslop and Daniel Landin
brief_description: The child sleeps. It is the morning of her birthday. She chooses her favourite shoes and her special dress. She is nine years old today. A parcel arrives. The saw has come. They played and they played and played. And then the inevitable happened.
description: The child sleeps. It is the morning of her birthday. She chooses her favourite shoes and her special dress. She is nine years old today. A parcel arrives. The saw has come. They played and they played and played. And then the inevitable happened.
